description: Start or create a timer for a specified duration.

slots.name: The optional name or purpose of the timer (e.g., 'cooking', 'laundry').
slots.duration: The duration for the timer, specified in seconds, minutes, or hours (e.g., '10 minutes', '1 hour', '30 seconds').
slots.remind: An optional reminder time before the timer ends, specified in seconds, minutes, or hours (e.g., '5 minutes').

examples: Start a timer for 10 minutes and remind me in 5 minutes.
